sentences.sentence: They admired the smoothness and efficiency with which the business was run.
sentences.translation: 他们钦佩这家公司协调高效的管理方式。

sentences.sentence: That excellence is not just the awesome energy of the best runners and the smoothness of the organisation, but also the quality of determination shown by all the competitors.
sentences.translation: 这种卓越不仅体现在最佳跑步者令人敬畏的能量和组织的流畅性上，也体现在所有参赛者所表现出的决心上。
